title: I don't hate gays
body:
In fact I have a gay friend and we get along super well at my school. We hang out for like 2 hours twice a week because we wait for our next class. (College.) 

But when it comes to Varus being changed from a straight champion to a gay champion, it bothers me.  It just shows how Riot is so vexing with the way they change champions without the opinions of the players.
